resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81973</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81973</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4588</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Letter Writing</string>
            <string language="es">Escritura de cartas</string>
            <string language="ga">Litreacha a Scríobh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichen-Schreiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écriture de Lettre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escrita Da Letra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scrittura Della Lettera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράψιμο επιστολών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This will help you write both the business letter and the personal letter. An advertisement from a newspaper is presented to you . You must write a letter of application to this advertisement and also prepare an envelope. Good layout of text is expected.</string>
            <string language="es">Esto le ayudará a escribir cartas de negocios y personales. Se presenta un anuncio de un periódico. Se debe escribir una carta de solicitud a este anuncio y también preparar un sobre. Se espera que el texto esté bien distribuido en la hoja.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cabhróidh sé seo leat litreacha gnó agus pearsanta a scríobh. Tugtar fógra as nuachtán duit. Caithfidh tú litir iarratais a scríobh chuig an bhfógra seo agus clúdach litreach a réiteach. Beifear ag súil le leagan amach maith ar an téacs.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">LCA</string>
            <string language="es">LCA. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">ATF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses hilft Ihnen, den Geschäftsbrief und den 
persönlichen Brief zu schreiben. Eine Reklameanzeige von einer 
Zeitung wird Ihnen dargestellt. Sie müssen einen 
Bezugsrechtsantrag zu dieser Reklameanzeige schreiben und einen 
Umschlag auch vorbereiten. Guter Plan des Textes wird erwartet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ceci vous aidera à écrire la lettre commerciale
et la lettre personnelle. Une publicité d'un journal vous est 
présentée. Vous devez écrire une lettre d'application à 
cette publicité et également préparer une enveloppe. La bonne
disposition du texte est prévue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto ajudar-lhe-á escrever  a letra de negócio 
e a letra pessoal. Uma propaganda de um jornal é-lhe 
apresentada. Você deve escrever uma letra de aplicação a esta
propaganda e também preparar um envelope. A disposição boa do
texto espera-se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò li aiuterà a scrivere sia la lettera di 
affari che la lettera personale. Una pubblicità da un giornale 
è presentata voi. Dovete scrivere una lettera dell'applicazione
a questa pubblicità ed anche preparare una busta. La buona 
disposizione di testo è prevista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό θα σας βοηθήσει να γράψετε και την επιχειρησιακή 
επιστολή και την προσωπική επιστολή. Μια διαφήμιση από μια 
εφημερίδα παρουσιάζεται σε σας. Πρέπει να γράψετε μια 
επιστολή της εφαρμογής σε αυτήν την διαφήμιση και να 
προετοιμάσετε επίσης έναν φάκελο. Το καλό σχεδιάγραμμα του
κειμένου αναμένεται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4588</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>

          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>

            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">16-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>open activity</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)

ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>

              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

N:Cleary;John;
FN:John Cleary
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
